card.name: Academy Rector
card.property: When Academy Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for an enchantment card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Archery Training
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an arrow counter on Archery Training. Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature, where X is the number of arrow counters on Archery Training."

card.name: Capashen Knight
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) {1}{W}: Capashen Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few warriors dare to challenge a knight of Capashen. Should one do so, there is one fewer.

card.name: Capashen Standard
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {2}, Sacrifice Capashen Standard: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Benalia has no need for peacocks to serve as symbols of vanity. The Capashens strut more proudly than any bird.

card.name: Capashen Templar
card.property: {W}: Capashen Templar gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their shields are Benalia's outermost battlements.

card.name: False Prophet
card.property: When False Prophet dies, exile all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You lived for Serra's love. Will you not die for it?"

card.name: Fend Off
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best defense is to not get hit.

card.name: Field Surgeon
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Commanders order soldiers to attack. Field surgeons order them to heal. Both are obeyed without question.

card.name: Flicker
card.property: Exile target nontoken permanent, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Who is truer: you who are, or you who are to be?

card.name: Jasmine Seer
card.property: {2} {W}, {T}: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Mask of Law and Grace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has protection from black and from red.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The archangels zealously drove Serra's light into every corner of their new home as if their creator still commanded them.

card.name: Master Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Behind his eyes is the pain of every soldier his hands have healed.

card.name: Opalescence
card.property: Each other non-Aura enchantment is a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Reliquary Monk
card.property: When Reliquary Monk dies, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A thing of Serra's realm exists only by the grace of her followers' faith.

card.name: Replenish
card.property: Return all enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treasures, trinkets, trash—the relics of the past are brought forth again.

card.name: Sanctimony
card.property: Whenever an opponent taps a Mountain for mana, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To forgive our enemies is to forgive ourselves."

card.name: Scent of Jasmine
card.property: Reveal any number of white cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Scour
card.property: Exile target enchantment. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that enchantment and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Serra Advocate
card.property: Flying {T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An angel's touch can prepare a soldier for battle more than a thousand military drills.

card.name: Solidarity
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their commitment to Serra is as solid as any shield.

card.name: Tethered Griffin
card.property: Flying When you control no enchantments, sacrifice Tethered Griffin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Poorly trained griffins sometimes attack the noble audiences that gather to watch their progress.

card.name: Tormented Angel
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Falling from heaven is not as painful as surviving the impact.

card.name: Voice of Duty
card.property: Flying, protection from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Next to Law is Duty, and Duty must be obeyed. If the frame of Duty is broken, none shall weave life's fabric." —Song of All, canto 167

card.name: Voice of Reason
card.property: Flying, protection from blue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Next to Grace is Reason, and Reason must be retained. If the web of Reason comes unwoven, madness will escape." —Song of All, canto 167

card.name: Wall of Glare
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Wall of Glare can block any number of creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The blinding barrier served Benalia better than a hundred shields.

card.name: Aura Thief
card.property: Flying When Aura Thief dies, you gain control of all enchantments. (You don't get to move Auras.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Illusion steals reality from the unwise.

card.name: Blizzard Elemental
card.property: Flying {3}{U}: Untap Blizzard Elemental.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Students who had seen Rayne argue with Urza were certain she had summoned it to make him seem warmer by comparison.

card.name: Brine Seer
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Bubbling Beebles
card.property: Bubbling Beebles can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Chancellor Rayne canceled the annual beeble roast. I should have married a crueler woman." —Barrin

card.name: Disappear
card.property: Enchant creature {U}: Return enchanted creature and Disappear to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If at first you don't succeed, run away and hide.

card.name: Donate
card.property: Target player gains control of target permanent you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Campus pranksters initiate new students with the old "beeble bomb" routine.

card.name: Fatigue
card.property: Target player skips their next draw step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mind if I just lie down right here for a few weeks?"

card.name: Fledgling Osprey
card.property: Fledgling Osprey has flying as long as it's enchanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It isn't truly born until its first flight.

card.name: Illuminated Wings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. {2}, Sacrifice Illuminated Wings: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a moment, Urza thought not of war and destruction, but of the freedom of the skies.

card.name: Iridescent Drake
card.property: Flying When Iridescent Drake enters the battlefield, put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to Iridescent Drake.

card.name: Kingfisher
card.property: Flying When Kingfisher dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's tastiest when served with the fish it stole.

card.name: Mental Discipline
card.property: {1} {U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barrin drowned his doubts about Urza's project by delving ever deeper into its details.

card.name: Metathran Elite
card.property: Metathran Elite can't be blocked as long as it's enchanted.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If the eyes are windows to the soul, their souls are not of this world.

card.name: Metathran Soldier
card.property: Metathran Soldier can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as Serra crafted angels of light and faith, Urza constructed an army of sorcery and power to resist the coming invasion.

card.name: Opposition
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urza says he's sane. Perhaps, but measures of sanity among planeswalkers are hard to come by." —Barrin

card.name: Private Research
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a page counter on Private Research. When enchanted creature dies, draw a card for each page counter on Private Research.

card.name: Quash
card.property: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Rayne, Academy Chancellor
card.property: Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card. You may draw an additional card if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted.

card.name: Rescue
card.property: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Urza, I've discovered more promising students than you and my husband have, combined. And I haven't lost a single one." —Rayne, Academy Chancellor

card.name: Scent of Brine
card.property: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.

card.name: Sigil of Sleep
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.

card.name: Telepathic Spies
card.property: When Telepathic Spies enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do try to keep an open mind, would you?"

card.name: Temporal Adept

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course she's at the head of her class. All her classmates have disappeared." —Gatha, Tolarian renegade

card.name: Thieving Magpie
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rayne once made several unkind comparisons between the bird's naked opportunism and Urza's.

card.name: Treachery
card.property: Enchant creature When Treachery enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands. You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The academy educates; I employ. It's a perfect arrangement." —Gatha, Tolarian renegade

card.name: Apprentice Necromancer
card.property: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.

card.name: Attrition
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will trade life for life with the insurgents. Our resources, unlike theirs, are limitless." —Davvol, Evincar of Rath

card.name: Body Snatcher
card.property: When Body Snatcher enters the battlefield, exile it unless you discard a creature card. When Body Snatcher dies, exile Body Snatcher and return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bubbling Muck
card.property: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps a Swamp for mana, that player adds an additional {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The muck claims a hundred living things for each meager treasure it spews forth.

card.name: Carnival of Souls
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life and add {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Davvol, blast those elves.' 'Davvol, transport those troops.' No one cares that today is my birthday."

card.name: Chime of Night
card.property: Enchant creature When Chime of Night is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many sent to serve Davvol carried such instruments, as if to remind him who their true masters were.

card.name: Disease Carriers
card.property: When Disease Carriers dies, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rath is a disease all its inhabitants carry.

card.name: Dying Wail
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This is a world of spiteful wasps that sting and kill even as they die.

card.name: Encroach
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonbasic land card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The rate of spread in this region is unacceptable. Start again." —Davvol, Evincar of Rath

card.name: Eradicate
card.property: Exile target nonblack creature. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that creature and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Festering Wound
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put an infection counter on Festering Wound. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Festering Wound deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of infection counters on Festering Wound.

card.name: Lurking Jackals
card.property: When an opponent has 10 or less life, if Lurking Jackals is an enchantment, it becomes a 3/2 Jackal creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Often it's not the hunter or the hunted but the opportunist who thrives in Rath.

card.name: Nightshade Seer
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Phyrexian Monitor
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Phyrexian Monitor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Being one would be an honor, if the word "honor" had any meaning in Phyrexia.

card.name: Phyrexian Negator
card.property: Trample Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.

card.name: Plague Dogs
card.property: When Plague Dogs dies, all creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. {2}, Sacrifice Plague Dogs: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They're not just retrievers, they're carriers.

card.name: Rapid Decay
card.property: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The grave robbers arrived the day after the burial. They were a day too late.

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.property: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For all the priceless tomes they have destroyed, one would think they would taste better." —Davvol, Evincar of Rath

card.name: Scent of Nightshade
card.property: Reveal any number of black cards in your hand. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Skittering Horror
card.property: When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Horror.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This monstrosity will do—for now." —Davvol, Evincar of Rath

card.name: Slinking Skirge
card.property: Flying {2}, Sacrifice Slinking Skirge: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Davvol encouraged the skirges; they made excellent sentries and were quite edible if properly seasoned.

card.name: Soul Feast
card.property: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As no one has ever accepted a second invitation to Davvol's table, the evincar often dines alone.

card.name: Squirming Mass
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the coldest hearts and the strongest stomachs can stand against it.

card.name: Twisted Experiment
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gatha showed remarkable prowess in increasing his subjects' stature. Their lifespans, however, were another matter.

card.name: Yawgmoth's Bargain
card.property: Skip your draw step. Pay 1 life: Draw a card.

card.name: Aether Sting
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a creature spell, Aether Sting deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Gatha fell, he was called to account for each abomination he created.

card.name: Bloodshot Cyclops
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Bloodshot Cyclops deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After their first encounter, the goblins named him Chuck.

card.name: Cinder Seer
card.property: {2} {R}, {T}: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Cinder Seer deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Colos Yearling
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.) {R}: Colos Yearling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A steed grows with its rider.

card.name: Covetous Dragon
card.property: Flying When you control no artifacts, sacrifice Covetous Dragon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gatha survived as long as he did by giving all Keld's predators exactly what they wanted.

card.name: Flame Jet
card.property: Flame Jet deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Did the land make the Keldons? Did the Keldons make the land? Or were they simply meant for each other?

card.name: Goblin Berserker
card.property: First strike, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins don't know the meaning of the word "tactics"—or the word "meaning," for that matter.

card.name: Goblin Festival
card.property: {2}: Goblin Festival deals 1 damage to any target. Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, choose one of your opponents. That player gains control of Goblin Festival.

card.name: Goblin Gardener
card.property: When Goblin Gardener dies, destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Grow food in dirt? Save time—eat dirt."

card.name: Goblin Marshal
card.property: Echo {4}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Goblin Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Goblin Masons
card.property: When Goblin Masons dies, destroy target Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Goblins build with true zeal—and anything else within arm's reach."

card.name: Hulking Ogre
card.property: Hulking Ogre can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Keldons' ogre campaign provided more body parts than my meager facility could properly use." —Gatha, Tolarian renegade

card.name: Impatience
card.property: At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player didn't cast a spell this turn, Impatience deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ask a Keldon to hold his temper and you'll be left holding your guts.

card.name: Incendiary
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Incendiary. When enchanted creature dies, Incendiary deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of fuse counters on Incendiary.

card.name: Keldon Champion
card.property: Haste Echo {2}{R}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Keldon Champion enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Keldon Vandals
card.property: Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Keldon Vandals enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldons divide all their spoils into two groups: trophies and catapult ammunition.

card.name: Landslide
card.property: Sacrifice any number of Mountains. Landslide deals that much damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Mark of Fury
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste. At the beginning of the end step, return Mark of Fury to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many Keldon warriors bear the mark of intentional insanity.

card.name: Reckless Abandon
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The climax of a warlord's career is always death.

card.name: Repercussion
card.property: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all Keld's warriors are found on the battlefield.

card.name: Scent of Cinder
card.property: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Sowing Salt
card.property: Exile target nonbasic land. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that land and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.property: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack, but when to stop.

card.name: Wake of Destruction
card.property: Destroy target land and all other lands with the same name as that land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Land charred black, rivers boiled, Crops and wells alike despoiled, Mountains leveled, forests felled— Footprints of the beasts of Keld.

card.name: Wild Colos
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'll never get a Keldon's goat.

card.name: Ancient Silverback
card.property: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian killing machines couldn't have known the seriousness of their mistake in wounding the ape—they'd never seen it angry.

card.name: Compost
card.property: Whenever a black card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fruit must rot before its seed can sprout. —Yavimaya saying

card.name: Elvish Lookout
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a masterful quilter, Yavimaya stitches together patches of color to warn its denizens of threats.

card.name: Elvish Piper
card.property: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more. —Elvish teaching

card.name: Emperor Crocodile
card.property: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

card.name: Gamekeeper
card.property: When Gamekeeper dies, you may exile it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

card.name: Goliath Beetle
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The balance of nature dictates that one day humans will be stepped on by bugs.

card.name: Heart Warden
card.property: {T}: Add {G}. {2}, Sacrifice Heart Warden: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Llanowar, we tend the forest's boughs and branches. In Yavimaya, we are a part of them." —Rofellos of Llanowar

card.name: Hunting Moa
card.property: Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Hunting Moa enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Ivy Seer
card.property: {2} {G}, {T}: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Magnify
card.property: All creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The seed torches' pollen gives off light, but the elves find it heightens their senses as well.

card.name: Marker Beetles
card.property: When Marker Beetles dies, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {2}, Sacrifice Marker Beetles: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In case of emergency, crush bug.

card.name: Momentum
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a growth counter on Momentum. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each growth counter on Momentum.

card.name: Multani's Decree
card.property: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 2 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is my place of power. Nothing can take root here unless I allow it." —Multani, maro-sorcerer

card.name: Pattern of Rebirth
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller may search their library for a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Plated Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.

card.name: Plow Under
card.property: Put two target lands on top of their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To renew the land, plow the land. To destroy the land, do nothing. —Druids' saying

card.name: Rofellos, Llanowar Emissary
card.property: {T}: Add {G} for each Forest you control.

card.name: Rofellos's Gift
card.property: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Return an enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rise, elf. We are both of Gaea, and thus we are equal."—Multani, to Rofellos

card.name: Scent of Ivy
card.property: Reveal any number of green cards in your hand. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

card.name: Splinter
card.property: Exile target artifact. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that artifact and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Taunting Elf
card.property: All creatures able to block Taunting Elf do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Much to Multani's chagrin, Rofellos gleefully tutored Yavimaya's elves on the rudest and most vulgar words spoken in Llanowar.

card.name: Thorn Elemental
card.property: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.

card.name: Yavimaya Elder
card.property: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library. {2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

card.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
card.property: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From each seed, a world. From each world, a thousand seeds.

card.name: Braidwood Cup
card.property: {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think it no accident that every civilized people has discovered the art of distillation." —Rofellos of Llanowar

card.name: Braidwood Sextant
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Braidwood Sextant: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Brass Secretary
card.property: {2}, Sacrifice Brass Secretary: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The students disliked the secretary for its unfailing memory—until they discovered it couldn't dodge thrown objects.

card.name: Caltrops
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks, Caltrops deals 1 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Toward the end, Gatha struggled to keep his experiments in and his patrons out.

card.name: Extruder
card.property: Echo {4} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the invasion drew closer, Urza's means began to resemble Phyrexia's end.

card.name: Fodder Cannon
card.property: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Step 1: Find your cousin. Step 2: Get your cousin in the cannon. Step 3: Find another cousin.

card.name: Junk Diver
card.property: Flying When Junk Diver dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mantis Engine
card.property: {2}: Mantis Engine gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {2}: Mantis Engine gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tawnos left a legacy of animal designs in many of Urza's creations.

card.name: Masticore
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Masticore unless you discard a card. {2}: Masticore deals 1 damage to target creature. {2}: Regenerate Masticore.

card.name: Metalworker
card.property: {T}: Reveal any number of artifact cards in your hand. Add {C}{C} for each card revealed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At this rate I fully expect to be replaced by a clockwork golem by year's end." —Barrin

card.name: Powder Keg
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a fuse counter on Powder Keg. {T}, Sacrifice Powder Keg: Destroy each artifact and creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of fuse counters on Powder Keg.

card.name: Scrying Glass
card.property: {3}, {T}: Choose a number greater than 0 and a color. Target opponent reveals their hand. If that opponent reveals exactly the chosen number of cards of the chosen color, you draw a card.

card.name: Storage Matrix
card.property: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, each player chooses artifact, creature, or land during their untap step. That player can untap only permanents of the chosen type this step.

card.name: Thran Dynamo
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

card.name: Thran Foundry
card.property: {1}, {T}, Exile Thran Foundry: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What we do not use up, we use again." —Urza

card.name: Thran Golem
card.property: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Karn felt more secure about his value to Urza when he realized he didn't need regular trimming.

card.name: Urza's Incubator
card.property: As Urza's Incubator enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creature spells of the chosen type cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stop thinking like an artificer, Urza, and start thinking like a father!" —Rayne, Academy Chancellor

card.name: Yavimaya Hollow
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {G}, {T}: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For all its traps and defenses, Yavimaya has its havens, too.
